title: 3 Quick Ways to Sync a Roku Remote Without a Pairing Button

steps.title: Press the Home button on your remote.
steps.content: Press the Home button on your remote. Make sure your Roku is connected and powered on. If you can't use the remote or you don't have one paired, you can control your Roku with the Roku app . Download the Roku app for iOS in the App Store or for Android in the Google Play Store . [1] X Research source Connect your mobile device to the same network as your Roku device. Select your Roku device during the app's set up. Once connected, tap Remote to use it as a remote.

steps.title: Select Settings.
steps.content: Select Settings . You may need to scroll down to find this option.

steps.title: Select Remote & devices.
steps.content: Select Remote & devices . This is in the right panel.

steps.title: Select Add Devices.
steps.content: Select Add Devices . A new page will open.

steps.title: Select Remote, and then Continue.
steps.content: Select Remote , and then Continue . If you're using the mobile app, have the remote ready.

steps.title: Follow the instructions on the screen.
steps.content: Follow the instructions on the screen. This will help you put your remote into pairing mode.

steps.title: Unplug the Roku from the power cord.
steps.content: Unplug the Roku from the power cord. This is the part that goes into the Roku device, not the power outlet.

steps.title: Wait at least 5 seconds.
steps.content: Wait at least 5 seconds. This allows the power to drain fully.

steps.title: Plug the power cord back in.
steps.content: Plug the power cord back in. It will take a few moments for the Roku to power on again.

steps.title: Follow the directions on the screen.
steps.content: Follow the directions on the screen. This will help put your remote into pairing mode.

steps.title: Press and hold the Back and Home buttons at the same time.
steps.content: Press and hold the Back and Home buttons at the same time. Do so for at least 5 seconds until the light flashes. Your voice remote may already have a pairing button. If you find one on the back of the remote, press and hold the button for 5 seconds until the light flashes.
